Package net.oneandone.maven.plugins.prerelease

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BareBase
    Perform update-promote without a working copy.
    BareBuild
    Preform build without a working copy.
    BareUpdate
    Perform update without a working copy.
    BareUpdatePromote
    Perform update-promote without a working copy.
    Base  
    Build
    Executes a build on an existing prerelease.
    Create
    Creates a prerelease with an uncommitted tag and undeployed artifacts.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on prerelease.
    Locksmith
    Find an delete stale locks.
    Lst
    Lists available prepreleases and display up-to-date information.
    ProjectBase  
    Promote
    Promotes a prerelease by commuting the tag and deploying its artifact(s).
    Swap
    Wipes archives and moves prereleases to the next storage.
    Update
    Checks if there is a prerelease for the last change in your svn working directory, creates one if not.
    UpdatePromote
    Updates and promotes a prerelease.
